## FixedProductTaxDisplaySettings enum

This enumeration display settings for the fixed product tax

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum FixedProductTaxDisplaySettings 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ExcludeFptAndIncludeWithDetails | <code>&quot;EXCLUDE_FPT_AND_INCLUDE_WITH_DETAILS&quot;</code> | The displayed price does not include the FPT amount. The values of ProductPrice.fixed\_product\_taxes and the price including the FPT are displayed separately. This value corresponds to 'Excluding FPT, Including FPT description and final price' |
|  ExcludeFptWithoutDetails | <code>&quot;EXCLUDE_FPT_WITHOUT_DETAILS&quot;</code> | The displayed price does not include the FPT amount. The values from ProductPrice.fixed\_product\_taxes are not displayed. This value corresponds to 'Excluding FPT' |
|  FptDisabled | <code>&quot;FPT_DISABLED&quot;</code> | The FPT feature is not enabled. You can omit ProductPrice.fixed\_product\_taxes from your query |
|  IncludeFptWithDetails | <code>&quot;INCLUDE_FPT_WITH_DETAILS&quot;</code> | The displayed price includes the FPT amount while displaying the values of ProductPrice.fixed\_product\_taxes separately. This value corresponds to 'Including FPT and FPT description' |
|  IncludeFptWithoutDetails | <code>&quot;INCLUDE_FPT_WITHOUT_DETAILS&quot;</code> | The displayed price includes the FPT amount without displaying the ProductPrice.fixed\_product\_taxes values. This value corresponds to 'Including FPT only' |
